description: This file defines an Angular standalone component 'ContextListComponent' which displays a list of contexts, including their status, model, tokens, and update time. It includes functionalities for refreshing the list, toggling stale contexts, and creating new contexts.

classes.name: ContextListComponent
classes.description: Angular component responsible for displaying and managing a list of context items with functionalities like refresh, toggle stale, and select context.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes the component, loads all contexts including stale ones, and subscribes to selection changes.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Triggers reloading of the context list, including stale contexts based on 'includeStale'.

methods.name: toggleStale
methods.description: Toggles the 'includeStale' boolean and refreshes the context list.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Selects a context item based on its ID.

methods.name: emitCreate
methods.description: Dispatches an event to signal creation of a new context.
